statements: SELECT * FROM EventGuests
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM EventGuests WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT guest_name, registration_date FROM EventGuests ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM EventGuests WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT guest_id, guest_email, preferences FROM EventGuests WHERE guest_id <= 10
SELECT * FROM EventGuests ORDER BY guest_name DESC, registration_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, preferences FROM EventGuests WHERE guest_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND event_id = 101 ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_email, registration_date FROM EventGuests WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND guest_email LIKE '%gmail%'
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, registration_date FROM EventGuests WHERE JSON_LENGTH(preferences) > 0 ORDER BY registration_date LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM EventGuests WHERE event_id = 100 OR (guest_id = 3 AND guest_email = 'john@example.com' AND JSON_EXTRACT(preferences, '$.theme') = 'Music') ORDER BY registration_date DESC, guest_name ASC
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guests WHERE event_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT guest_name, registration_date FROM guests ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM guests g JOIN preferences p ON g.guest_id = p.guest_id;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id FROM guests;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guests WHERE event_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;

SELECT guest_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM guests JOIN preferences ON guests.guest_id = preferences.guest_id WHERE guests.event_id = 'xyz-789' AND preferences.preference_type = 'Food' ORDER BY guest_name ASC, preference_value DESC;

SELECT guest_name, COUNT(pref_id) AS preference_count FROM guests LEFT JOIN preferences ON guests.guest_id = preferences.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name HAVING preference_count >= 2 ORDER BY preference_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_event_creators;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM virtual_event_creators;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, event_id FROM guest_registrations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_registrations WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT preferred_food, seating_preferences FROM guest_preferences;
SELECT * FROM virtual_event_creators WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM virtual_event_creators WHERE creator_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, event_id FROM guest_registrations WHERE event_id = 100 ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, preferred_food FROM guest_registrations JOIN guest_preferences ON guest_registrations.registration_id = guest_preferences.guest_id;
SELECT preference_id, guest_id, seating_preferences FROM guest_preferences WHERE preferred_food = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY preference_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventCreators;
SELECT creator_id, creator_name, email FROM EventCreators WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, creator_id FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM Guests WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT event_name, preference FROM Events JOIN GuestPreferences ON Events.event_id = GuestPreferences.event_id;
SELECT * FROM EventCreators;
SELECT creator_name, email FROM EventCreators ORDER BY creator_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT creator_name, email, event_name FROM EventCreators JOIN Events ON EventCreators.creator_id = Events.creator_id;
SELECT guest_name, preference FROM Guests JOIN GuestPreferences ON Guests.guest_id = GuestPreferences.guest_id;
SELECT * FROM event_planners;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT event_id, COUNT(guest_id) AS guest_count FROM event_guests GROUP BY event_id HAVING guest_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM event_planners WHERE event_planner_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_id, guest_id FROM event_guests WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guests WHERE guest_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events JOIN event_guests ON events.event_id = event_guests.event_id WHERE guest_id = 2;
